altTitles.en: The Poor Performing Student of a Magic High School
The Irregular at Magic High School

description.en:
A side story of Mahouka Koukou no Rettousei that focuses on Shiba Tatsuya's younger sister's viewpoint and experiences of the events taking place in the main story.
